Getting Started

This documentation assumes that you are already familiar with Typescript and Expressjs and also some of the tools from the latest standards such as classes and modules. The code samples are written using TypeScript (can be written with the latest JavaScript) and using decorators for metadata.

Prerequisites

Dinoloop is built on top of ES6 Async, please make sure Node.js installed supports Async and Promise. Dinoloop uses express.Router extensively for API routing, install Express.js that supports express.Router. Following are the versions we have tested, please make sure you have installed. Any issues please file on github to help the community.

  • Node.js 8.10.x or higher
  • Expressjs 4.x.x or higher
  • Typescript 2.4.x or higher

Installation

1. Starter project without DI framework

$ git clone https://github.com/ParallelTask/dinoloop-starter.git
$ cd dinoloop-starter
$ npm install
$ npm start

2. Starter project with Inversifyjs DI framework

$ git clone https://github.com/ParallelTask/dinoloop-inversify-starter.git
$ cd dinoloop-inversify-starter.git
$ npm install
$ npm start

Navigate to http://localhost:8088/api/home/get in browser. You should be able to see the "Hello World!" response
